title: Spicy rice with chickpeas
ingredients: ['1 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 onion, sliced', '3 tbsp medium curry paste', '175g basmati rice, rinsed', '500ml vegetable stock, hot', '1 sweet potato, peeled and chopped into small chunks', '4 medium tomatoes, chopped', '25g sultanas', '400g can chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '3 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '50g unsalted cashews, roughly chopped']
